name: Locks & Beagles
description:
Travel through several different mazes fillied with locks and moving walls! Navigate around and try your best to find the way out!

Meet Benjamin the Beagle!


And Heath the Husky!

Swapping between these two will enable you to travel around different parts of each maze. You'll need both dogs to team up and help each other reach the green goal!

Benjamin and Heath talk about how they're lost in this maze and want to escape!
  • W, A, S, D movement
  • Spacebar to swap between dogs
  • Mouse left-click to select menu options

Music by Harry Pepe - https://www.ivscore.com/ https://twitter.com/IVscore

Graphics, shaders, programming, game design by Anthpny Pepe - https://bitzawolf.com/ https://twitter.com/bitzawolf

(I'm so, so sorry the music and SFX cut out on level 2 and onward. I'm still figuring out how to incorporate FMOD into Unity)
